attributes.additional_details: In the recent budget it was decided to make cuts to PIP, for disabled people, for most this would detrimental to their health and wellbeing. New cuts will put hundred of thousands of claimants at risk. PIP application was already a torture for disabled people. This cut is a violation of human rights
attributes.background: Reverse the new changes to PIP benefits affecting thousands of claimants. Reverse the minimum score of 4 points to qualify.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
